text:
Naima El Bezaz (3 March 1974 – 7 August 2020) was a Moroccan-Dutch writer. She also gave lectures and wrote stories, essays and columns.
In September 2006, her third and most controversial book appeared, "De verstotene", which talked about controversial content and criticism of religious dogmatism.
Bezaz died on 7 August 2020 after killing herself in Alphen aan den Rinjn, aged 46.
